CustomField.description: a list of the fields on the sObjects to process that must be supplied to this trigger. This is used for the record reprocessor tool so that it may pre-select the needed fields on the records when attempting to run trigger logic.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: a list of the fields on the sObjects to process that must be supplied to this trigger. This is used for the record reprocessor tool so that it may pre-select the needed fields on the records when attempting to run trigger logic.
CustomField.label: Required Input Fields
